Class DateTimeConversion

java.lang.Object
com.example.utilities.DateTimeConversion
public class DateTimeConversion extends Object
DateTimeConversion Class - Used to facilitate the time conversions throughout the Application

      public DateTimeConversion()

  • Method Details

    • availableAppointmentTimes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<LocalTime> availableAppointmentTimes()
      Available Appointment Times. This method creates a list of available appointment times to be displayed for user selection based on the available business hours in EST converted to local time. The times are added to a list for easier user selection, and to ensure the validation of appointments ONLY during business hours in EST.
      Returns:
      observableList of appointment times determined from EST time to local user time.

    • getUserDisplayTime

      public static Timestamp getUserDisplayTime(Timestamp sqlTime)
      Get Local User Time. Takes a timestamp as a parm, then creates a datetime format for proper display to the application users. It determines the user zoneID and converts the UTC timestamp from the DB to EST time, and then converts that EST time to the user local time zone for display.
      Parameters:
      sqlTime - timestamp passed in to be converted to user local time
      Returns:
      a timestamp formatted and converted to user local time.

    • saveToDB

      public static Timestamp saveToDB(Timestamp localtime)
      Converts time from user local time to be saved in the DB. Takes a timestamp from the user local time, and formats it into a DateTime. It then takes the timestamp and gets the ETC time conversion. With the ETC time, it then converts that into UTC time to be saved in the DB.
      Parameters:
      localtime - current user local timestamp
      Returns:
      timestamp converted to EST and then to UTC to be saved in the DB.

    • getWeek

      public static javafx.util.Pair<LocalDate,LocalDate> getWeek()
      Determines the week of the current day This method gets the full week values of the current user date. It determines how far the current day is from Sunday (Start of the week) and Saturday (end of week) and gets those dates of the sunday and saturday of the current week. It then returns a pair with these two values to be used to calendar/table filtering.
      Returns:
      a pair containing the date of the start of the week and end of week for filtering calendar.
